q: Former Secretary of State Colin Powell says he is voting for Barack Obama . "He has both style and substance. I think he is a transformational figure," Colin Powell said on NBC's "Meet the Press." Barack Obama displayed a steadiness. Showed intellectual vigor. He has a definitive way of doing business that will do us well, Colin Powell said. Colin Powell , a retired US general and a Republican, was once seen as a possible Barack Obamaial candidate himself. Colin Powell said he questioned Sen. John McCain 's judgment in picking Gov.
